name: Recyclobot
description:
Created for the VR Game Jam for Oculus Touch.

You are a robot tasked with disposing of single use (one time use) rubbish, piece by piece. My take on the VR Game Jam theme. A rubbish beat sabre...

My first game jam and first "full" game. I've submitted this early otherwise would have implemented many improvements (including animated robo hands, sorry), sadly I am off on Holiday so can't implement them, maybe after the Jam when I have some more time! It's short but fun, hope you enjoy it!

Objective

Grab the rubbish from the conveyor belt and throw it into the correct coloured bins either side of you. Collect enough rubbish to progress to the next level.
